snippet.title: THE LIGHT CORRIDOR (AMIGA - FULL GAME)
snippet.description:
Zeus presents The Light Corridor (un-emulated) for the Amiga A500, a true classic from the golden era of amiga gaming which must not be forgotten alongside the software house and all programmers that were involved in making this game.

Year of release: 1990

The amiga version of this unusual bat'n'ball game, control the ball down 50 stages of the tunnel whilst picking up bonuses and increasing your score.
This is ridiculous as far as difficulty is concerned, the ball moves just too fast to be able to enjoy this game properly, sometimes you just cannot get to it in time, i must have died a hundred times doing this longplay, but i'm proud that once again the Zeusdaz channel has produced another longplay that has not been done before,...shame about the lousy ending which should have been far more rewarding for completing this.
I have used the infinite balls trainer so i could upload the entire game for your viewing pleasure.

Hope all you Amiga fans enjoy this upload.

Please note: NONE of my game uploads are emulated in any way whatsoever, they are 100% original recordings by myself taken directly from the original hardware the game was intended for, that way you know you're watching the real thing.
I will also always state weather i am using any cheats in the game, if not mentioned then i am not using any.
Check out my channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ/videos), dedicated to gamers who loved the games of yesteryear.

Feel free to leave comments on my channel and vid's.

Keeping the memory of the Amiga and it's cool games alive!!!
